item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:-27 Chances: Palantir has surged into a buy area and won a $178 million contract with the US Army for AI-enabled ground stations, indicating strong growth potential. The company’s stock has jumped more than 200% over the past year, showing strong performance and investor interest.
